channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Hello
item.description: I’m Ved Topkar, a fourth year MD/PhD student at Stanford Medical School interested in RNA biology, entrepreneurship, and computer science education. Currently, I work as a Biophysics PhD student in the Das Lab. A summary of my current and previous research experiences can be found at the research and publications pages. In the past, I was involved with Beacon Genomics, a genome editing specificity and safety company spun out of the Joung Lab.
